Title: Provides that the commissioner of environmental conservation shall place and operate certain air quality monitoring systems in proximity to N.Y. city airports
Summary: Provides that the commissioner of environmental conservation shall place and operate certain air quality monitoring systems in proximity to NY city airports.
LawCode: Add ยง19-0322, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to requiring the commissioner of environmental conservation to place certain air quality monitoring systems within a one-mile radius of all airports located within a city having a population of one million or more
